text: Sancho I may refer to: * Sancho I of Gascony (died 812), Basque Duke * Sancho I of Pamplona (circa 860–925), Navarrese monarch * Sancho I Ordóñez (circa 895–929), King of Galicia * Sancho I of León (died 966), two-time King of León * Sancho I of Aragon (c. 1042 – 4 June 1094), second king of Aragon * Sancho I of Astarac (fl. 1050–1096/1119), count of Astarac * Sancho I of Portugal (1154–1212), King of Portugal
title: Sancho I
